body_html:
@Hoeze The op is exposed as tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to for now (See #15243 (comment)):

# python
Python 2.7.12 (default, Dec  4 2017, 14:50:18) 
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> tf.__version__
'1.9.0-dev20180604'
>>> tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to
<function broadcast_to at 0x7f1f8588c230>
>>>

body:
@Hoeze The op is exposed as `tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to` for now (See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15243#discussion_r178889285):
```
# python
Python 2.7.12 (default, Dec  4 2017, 14:50:18) 
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux2
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> tf.__version__
'1.9.0-dev20180604'
>>> tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to
<function broadcast_to at 0x7f1f8588c230>
>>> 
```
